Name: Council of the Damned
Details: The Council of the Damned is the ruling power over the worlds of the Tortuga Dominions. Usually consisting of the current ruler's supporters, the current leader is Lady Paula 'Death' Trevaline, who assumed the position of senior mate after killing its last occupier, Lord Kalvin Bar-Dyness, in a duel. It is widely rumored that Lady Death and her supporters recovered a massive treasure from Bar-Dyness and his dead supporters when they achieved control of the Dominion's worlds.
